baseRule.text: 若比丘。僧差教誡比丘尼。從日沒乃至明相未出。波夜提。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhu Pācittiya 22

fullParallels.text: Sammatopi ce bhikkhu atthaṅgate sūriye bhikkhuniyo ovadeyya, pācittiyaṁ.
fullParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 22

translations.text: Selbst wenn ein Mönch zur (Belehrung der Nonnen) befugt ist, belehrt er die Nonnen nach Sonnenuntergang, muß er dafür sühnen.
Even if he has been appointed, if a monk instructs the nuns after sunset, he commits an offense entailing confession.
Si un bhikkhu, incluso, habiendo sido autorizado, instruye a las bhikkhunis después de la puesta de sol: [La acción] ha de ser confesada

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。僧雖差教誡比丘尼。是比丘乃至日沒時。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 22

fullParallels.text: 若比丘僧雖差教比丘尼。乃至日沒。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 22

fullParallels.text: 若復苾芻雖被眾差教誡苾芻尼。乃至日沒時。而教誡者。波逸底迦。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 22

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。僧差教誡比丘尼至日沒。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 22

fullParallels.text: 「若比丘！為僧差，教授比丘尼，乃至日暮者，波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 22

translations.text: If a monk, commissioned by the monks, impart in struction to the bhikṣuṇīs, and continue to do so when the sun has gone down, it is Pācittiya.
Jika seorang bhikṣu, setelah ditugaskan oleh Saṅgha, mengajar para bhikṣuṇī setelah matahari terbenam, ia melakukan sebuah pāyattika.

fullParallels.text: 若比丘為僧差。教授比丘尼。乃至日沒波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 22

fullParallels.text: 若比丘為僧差教授比丘尼。乃至日沒。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Kāśyapīya Bhikkhu Pācittiya 22
